document_type: Final Determination Notification and Payroll Authorization Forms
security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document includes a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board regarding the postponed release of HSCA staff payroll records and the associated payroll authorization forms for Cynthia S. Cooper, citing privacy concerns over the release of Social Security numbers.
summary_one_paragraph: The document consists of a Final Determination Notification from the Assassination Records Review Board concerning HSCA staff payroll records, specifically addressing postponements related to Social Security numbers to protect personal privacy. It also contains payroll authorization forms for Cynthia S. Cooper, documenting her employment as a Document Control Clerk with the John F. Kennedy Task Force, including her effective dates, salary adjustments, and certifications related to familial relationships with members of Congress, signed by Louis Stokes, Chairman.
title: HSCA Staff Payroll Records: Final Determination and Payroll Authorizations
